page.title: 16Recreational activities.
page.content:
The major outdoor activity is coarse {fishing}in the River Trent but most of the participants are visitors to the area. Other river associated pastimes are boating, picnicking and walking. The National Hunt{race course}at Rolleston attracts both local people and outsiders. {Outdoor}pursuits are cricket, tennis, football, cycling, walking, horse riding, shooting and gardening. {Indoor}ones include socialising and playing darts, dominoes and pool at the local pubs, attending meetings of the local clubs and taking part in whist drives and church social events. Many people, especially children, have to travel outside the area for other pursuits.
A minority of people actually take part in local organised activities.
